title: Object - Equity Compensation Release Transaction
description: Object describing equity compensation security release transaction

object_type.description: This is done to avoid a breaking change as we work towards a bigger restructure of the equity types in v2.0.0. `TX_PLAN_SECURITY_RELEASE` will be deprecated in v2.0.0
object_type.title: Enum - Object Type

comments.description: Unstructured text comments related to and stored for the object

security_id.description: Identifier for the security (stock, plan security, warrant, or convertible) by which it can be referenced by other transaction objects. Note that while this identifier is created with an issuance object, it should be different than the issuance object's `id` field which identifies the issuance transaction object itself. All future transactions on the security (e.g. acceptance, transfer, cancel, etc.) must reference this `security_id` to qualify which security the transaction applies to.

date.description: Date on which the transaction occurred
date.title: Type - Date

settlement_date.title: Type - Date
settlement_date.description: Type represention of an ISO-8601 date, e.g. 2022-01-28

release_price.description: The release price used to determine the value of the security at the time of release
release_price.title: Type - Monetary

consideration_text.description: Unstructured text description of consideration provided in exchange for security release

resulting_security_ids.title: Security Release - Resulting Security ID Array
resulting_security_ids.description: Identifier of the new security (or securities) issuance resulting from a release transaction
